## Front Matter
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#Exploration of Features
```{r}
# PRECTOT - Total Precipitation
ggplot(data=droughtdf, mapping=aes(x=PRECTOT)) +
  geom_density()

# PS - Surface Pressure
ggplot(data=droughtdf, mapping=aes(x=PS)) +
  geom_density()

# QV2M - Specific Humidity at 2 meters
ggplot(data=droughtdf, mapping=aes(x=QV2M)) +
  geom_density()
```

### DroughDF fips
```{r}
#location fips
droughtdf %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  head() 

droughtdf %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  tail() 
```

### Soil fips
```{r}
soil %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  head() 

soil %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  tail() 
```
### PRECTOT and FIPS
```{r}
droughtdf %>%
  group_by(fips,PRECTOT) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(PRECTOT)) %>%
  tail()
```
